name: Nirmal Gyan Daan Academy Society
briefDescription: Our School Nirmal Ashram Gyan Daan Academy, Khairi-Kalan, Rishikesh (School Code-57189) is a Co-educational Secondary Free Day School, affiliated to CBSE, New Delhi. The students get education, transport, school uniforms, stationery, mid-day meal and medical check-up, all free of cost. At present the school has about 800 students on its Roll from LKG to X, all from economically weaker sections of society.
